00075 void ReservationManagement::roomReservation(QDate DateFrom,QDate DateTo,Room room,Customer customer)
00076 {
00077     QMessageBox msgBox;
00078     RoomManagement RM;
00079 
00080     //if room is not free in this period
00081    if(RM.getStatus(room.getRoomNumber(), DateFrom, DateTo))
00082     {
00083         msgBox.setText("Reservation not made.\nRoom is not free at the moment.");
00084         msgBox.exec();
00085     }
00086    else
00087    {
00088        if( ReservationManagement::checkInData(room,customer) )
00089        {
00090             QSqlQuery query;
00091             query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00092             query.prepare("insert into RoomsReservation (DateFrom,DateTo,fkCustomerId,fkRoomId)"
00093                                      "values(:datefrom, :dateto, :custid, :roomid)");
00094 
00095            query.bindValue(":datefrom",DateFrom.toString(QString("d/M/yyyy")));
00096            query.bindValue(":dateto", DateTo.toString(QString("d/M/yyyy")));
00097            query.bindValue(":custid", customer.getId());
00098            query.bindValue(":roomid", room.getRoomNumber());
00099            query.exec();
00100        }
00101    }
00102 
00103 }

00114 bool ReservationManagement::checkInData(Room room, Customer customer)
00115 {
00116 
00117     int rNum=room.getRoomNumber();
00118     QString cId=customer.getId();
00119     QChar c;
00120     int error = 0;
00121     bool ret = false;
00122 
00123 
00124     foreach(c,cId)
00125     {
00126         if(!c.isLetterOrNumber())
00127         {
00128            error++;
00129         }
00130     }
00131     if(error != 0 || rNum == 0)
00132     {
00133       QMessageBox::warning(0,"Input Data Error","Invalid customer id\nOr room number");
00134       ret = false;
00135     }
00136 
00137 
00138     else
00139         ret = true;
00140 
00141 
00142     return ret;
00143 }

00161 double ReservationManagement::roomCheckout(int RoomNumber)
00162 {
00163             Room room;
00164             QString date1;
00165             QString date2;
00166             QStringList SplitDate1;
00167             QStringList SplitDate2;
00168             bool check = false;
00169             int daysToPay = 0;
00170             int resId = 0;
00171             double totAmount = 0;
00172             double price = 0;
00173             QSqlQuery query;
00174             query = sqlMechanism.myQuery();
00175 
00176             /*
00177              *select the capacity of the room that is about to Check Out
00178              */
00179             query.prepare("SELECT Capacity FROM Rooms WHERE RoomNumber= :rNum");
00180             query.bindValue(":rNum",RoomNumber);
00181 
00182             if(!query.exec())
00183                     {
00184                         QMessageBox::information(0,"Search Error","There is no room with that number");
00185                         return -1;
00186                     }
00187 
00188                 while(query.next())
00189                    {
00190                        room.setCapacity(query.value(0).toInt());
00191                        check = true;
00192                    }
00193                 if(!check)
00194                 {
00195                     QMessageBox::information(0,"Search Error","There is no room with that number");
00196                     return -1;
00197                 }
00198             /*
00199              *select the price of a room with the current capacity
00200              */
00201             if(check)
00202              {
00203                 query.prepare("SELECT Price FROM Prices WHERE RoomCapacity= :cap");
00204                 query.bindValue(":cap",room.getCapacity());
00205                 query.exec();
00206 
00207                 while(query.next())
00208                 {
00209                     price = query.value(0).toDouble();
00210                     check = true;
00211                 }
00212                 if(0==price)
00213                 {
00214                     QMessageBox::information(0,"Search Error","There is no price for that capacity");
00215                     check = false;
00216                     return -1;
00217                 }
00218               }
00219                 else
00220                     return -1;
00221 
00222 
00223             /*
00224              *select DateFrom, DateTo and reservation id of the current reservation
00225              */
00226             if(check)
00227             {
00228                 query.prepare("SELECT * FROM RoomsReservation WHERE fkRoomId= :rNum");
00229                 query.bindValue(":rNum",RoomNumber);
00230 
00231                 if(!query.exec())
00232                 {
00233                     QMessageBox::information(0,"Search Error","There is no reservation for that room");
00234                     check = false;
00235                     return -1;
00236                 }
00237                 while(query.next())
00238                 {
00239 
00240                     date1 = query.value(1).toString();
00241                     date2 = query.value(2).toString();
00242                     resId = query.value(0).toInt();
00243                     SplitDate1=date1.split("/");
00244                     SplitDate2=date2.split("/");
00245 
00246 
00247                     QString year1 = SplitDate1.at(2);
00248                     QString day1 = SplitDate1.at(0);
00249                     QString month1 = SplitDate1.at(1);
00250 
00251                     QString year2 = SplitDate2.at(2);
00252                     QString day2 = SplitDate2.at(0);
00253                     QString month2 = SplitDate2.at(1);
00254 
00255                     SplitDate1.clear();
00256                     SplitDate2.clear();
00257                     /*
00258                      *add the dates into QDate objects
00259                      */
00260 
00261                     QDate checkIn(year1.toInt(),month1.toInt(),day1.toInt());
00262                     QDate checkOut(year2.toInt(),month2.toInt(),day2.toInt());
00263 
00264                     if(QDate::currentDate()>= checkIn && QDate::currentDate()<=checkOut)
00265                     {
00266 
00267                         daysToPay = checkIn.daysTo(checkOut);
00268 
00269 
00270 
00271                         if(0 == daysToPay)
00272                         {
00273                             daysToPay = 1;
00274                         }
00275 
00276                         totAmount = daysToPay * price;
00277                         /*
00278                         *save the totAmount in a vector
00279                         */
00280                         checkOutSum.push_back(totAmount);
00281 
00282                         /*
00283                          *delete the current reservation from the database
00284                         */
00285                         query.prepare("DELETE FROM RoomsReservation WHERE prIdReservation= :resId");
00286                         query.bindValue(":resId",resId);
00287                         query.exec();
00288 
00289                         return totAmount;
00290                     }
00291                     else
00292                         QMessageBox::information(0,"information","Check out not possible, try cancelation");
00293 
00294                 }
00295             }
00296             else
00297                 QMessageBox::information(0,"Error","Operation Failed");
00298                 return -1;
